pages.text: The $(item)Solid Fuel Purifier$() is a simple machine that uses burnable fuel and a filter to purify liquids.$(br2)Filter items can be inserted into the top of the block, fuel items are inserted into the back, and fluid containers can be inserted and extracted into any other side.$(br2)Fluids can be pumped into or
out of the machine from any face.$(br2)The $(item)Solid Fuel Purifier$() cannot fill $(item)Empty Bottles$().
